abilities.name: Fear of the Unseen
abilities.rule: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1. In addition, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if such an enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Feeder Tendrils
abilities.rule: Each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model, you gain 1CP.
